scripts.main:node: cd Source && node set httpport:8080 password:somePassword
scripts.main:run: cd Source && pm2 start run-node.js --name node-W
scripts.main:stop: cd Source && pm2 stop run-node.js --name node-W
scripts.main:restart: cd Source && pm2 restart run-node.js --name node-W
scripts.main:delete: cd Source && pm2 delete run-node.js --name node-W
scripts.test:node: cd SourceJinn && node set httpport:8800 password:somePassword
scripts.test:run: cd SourceJinn && pm2 start run-jinn.js --name node-T
scripts.test:stop: cd SourceJinn && pm2 stop run-jinn.js  --name node-T
scripts.test:restart: cd SourceJinn && pm2 restart run-jinn.js  --name node-T
scripts.test:delete: cd SourceJinn && pm2 delete run-jinn.js  --name node-T
scripts.credits:run: cd SourceCredits && pm2 start run-node.js --name node-C
scripts.credits:stop: cd SourceCredits && pm2 stop run-node.js --name node-C
scripts.credits:restart: cd SourceCredits && pm2 restart run-node.js --name node-C
scripts.credits:delete: cd SourceCredits && pm2 delete run-node.js --name node-C
scripts.delete: rimraf ./DATA-CREDITS/err.log && rimraf ./DATA-CREDITS/DB && rimraf ./DATA-CREDITS/jinn-nodes-8.lst && rimraf ./DATA-CREDITS/log.log && rimraf ./DATA-CREDITS/log-tx.log && rimraf ./DATA-CREDITS/WALLET && rimraf ./DATA-CREDITS/Update
